name: Throws and Takedowns
description: Master techniques for off-balancing and taking down an opponent with controlled force.

cards.title: Basic Hip Throw
cards.description: A fundamental throwing technique used to lift and flip an opponent over the hip.
bulletpoints: Get close to the opponent for maximum leverage
Rotate the hips to generate momentum
Control the fall to prevent injury

cards.title: Leg Sweep Takedown
cards.description: A sweeping motion used to trip an opponent off balance.
bulletpoints: Use a low stance for stability
Sweep the leg in a controlled manner
Follow up with a pin or submission
